channel.title: How to add stuff
channel.description: i know a bit of coding like [code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("givemestuff")) [/code] how do i add commands properly because wehn i try to make a command,when i compiled it said 100 errors :S i got rid of now but help me plz

item.title: How to add stuff
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

[quote=“smkscape, post:2, topic:243454”]you mean make commands? they give stuff?
you can search:

if (command.startsWith

under that you can add more commands. Like:

if (command.startsWith("items") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(itemid, howmuch);

So if you make the command:

if (command.startsWith("money") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(995, 3000);

And you type in game ::money you get 300gp and if you change the playerRights >= 0
in playerRights >= 2
Only admins/owners can do it then.

So:

playerRights >= 0 = All players

playerRights >= 1 = Playermod/admins/owners

playerRights >= 2 = Admins/owners

playerRights >= 3 = Only owners

I hope i helped you a bit ?

Edit: Don’t forget to add } under evry command.[/quote]

Nice ending-curly brace.

Read full topic

@kevin5475845 wrote:

i know…

it’s just that the he took it with a { and not ended it with a }

add under

private void customCommand(String command) {

item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“kevin5475845, post:4, topic:243454”]if (command.startsWith("money") && playerRights >= 3) { addItem(995, 3000); }

to make it not give 100 errors…[/quote]

You dont need the {} as it’s only one line of code.
